author: wmtan
body:
MVAComputer was using introspection to clone an object.  In ROOT 6, this causes unnecessary header parsing, which increases memory use.  It is also significantly slower, in ROOT 5 as well as ROOT 6.
It is easy to do this without introspection.
This pull request is for ROOT 6.  The same change will be done for ROOT 5 (in another pull request) for code commonality, unless it causes problems in ROOT 5.
Please merge this request as soon as convenient.
title: Don't use introspection in MVAComputer
